headline: Howmet Aerospace Inc. Announces Pricing of Debt Offering
summary: Howmet Aerospace Inc. ("Howmet Aerospace" or the "Company") (NYSE: HWM) today announced that it has priced its underwritten public offering of $400,000,000 aggregate principal amount of 3.750% notes due 2028 (the "2028 Notes"), $300,000,000 aggregate principal amount of 3.900% notes due 2029 (the "2029 Notes") and $500,000,000 aggregate principal amount of 4.750% notes due 2036 (the "2036 Notes" and, together with the 2028 Notes and the 2029 Notes, the "Notes"). The offering is expected to close

headline: UBS Maintains Neutral on Howmet Aerospace, Raises Price Target to $260
summary: UBS  analyst Gavin Parsons   maintains Howmet Aerospace (NYSE:HWM) with a Neutral and raises the price target from $228 to $260.

headline: How Jet Engines Are Powering Data Centers
summary: Companies are converting aircraft engines to land-based natural gas turbines for power generation in the AI boom.
